Move to IDs 

    Example: <a href="#Profolio"> Profolio </a>

    <div id="#Profolio"> Profolio </div>
    <div>

     Back to Top Example: <div class="goup"> <img src="images/top.png" alt="" >   </div> </div>

     Add class = "goup"  into the "div" and add an image or animated object it's up to you!.

     <div class="goup">  < Add something >  </div> </div>

     you can add this <div class="goup"> ? </div> anywhere into the body
